page.title: 14Clubs
page.content: Kynnersley Working Mans Club Windmill Lane This club is open for business most evenings and Sunday lunche time when alcohol is sold.Primarily for workers of the village, membership is open to anyone wishing to join by application to the club committee.Fees are approx Â£1 per year.Functions held at the club include Bingo_weekly,Darts & Dominoes in winter,Whist drives_fortnightly, Discoes_monthly,Garden club_monthly. Womens Institute founded in 1976 thie is based in Kynnersley village hall with an active group of aprox 30 members from surrounding villages. Meetings are held the first Tuesday of each month except August. Events include raising money for charity, excursions,carol singing, coffee evenings.Craft classes are held in members homes.
